modName: StormCloak Officer Armour With Sleeves Replacer
summary: Simple addition of sleeves and pants.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces Stormcloak Officer Armor, I ran into a bug after editing in blender so I just made the armor make you always appear at maximum weight. Think of it as bulky snow-proof gear. No females for now, they require a bit more editing since they arent wearing pants at all. I will look into the weight-slider bug.



Sleeved Guards http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37324/?

Darker Imperial Armor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41911/?

Sleeved Imperials http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50281/?

Imperial Legate Armor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50375/?
author: Fourkillmaster
